nodes.bodyText:
Please confirm why line number changed from 32 to 31.

  
    
      checkstyle/src/test/resources/com/puppycrawl/tools/checkstyle/checks/imports/avoidstaticimport/InputAvoidStaticImportDefault.java
    
    
         Line 31
      in
      555199e
    
    
    
    

        
          
           import static com.puppycrawl.tools.checkstyle.checks.imports.avoidstaticimport.InputAvoidStaticImportNestedClass.InnerClass; 
        
    
  


I am not seeing a reason why in the file as it doesn't span more than 1 line.

nodes.bodyText:
#476
I don't see any reason for the duplicate import. Normally we wouldn't change inputs like this as they may be testing something. Additionally, to remove a line from a file with violations will cause the entire test's line numbers to change.
If you want to keep this change, it must be another commit since it is outside the scope of this issue.

nodes.bodyText: @strkkk We are not expecting inputs to be changed in these issues.

@rnveach it is a duplicated import.
Line 26 in same file contains exactly same import, so this line is redundant.
It is out of scope of this issue, but I asked @gaurabdg to remove it,
#7853 (comment)
